member.name: T:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientFileGenerator
member.summary: Generator to create client files based of candid definitions from `.did` files or from a canister id

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientFileGenerator.GenerateClientFromCanisterAsync(EdjCase.ICP.Candid.Models.Principal,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates client files for a canister based on its id. This only works if the canister has the `candid:service` meta data available in its public state
member.param: The canister to get the definition from
The base namespace to use in the generated files
Optional. The name of the client class and file to use. Defaults to 'Service'
Optional. The http boundry node url to use, otherwise uses the default

member.name: M:EdjCase.ICP.ClientGenerator.ClientFileGenerator.GenerateClientFromFile(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Generates client files for a canister based on a `.did` file definition
member.param: The base namespace to use in the generated files
Optional. The name of the client class and file to use. Defaults to 'Service'
The path where the `.did` definition file is located
